Description: 
-------------------- 
Powered by The Sims Studio, The Sims Medieval presents a new type of gameplay in the classic pattern of the series, allowing players to create heroes, participate in adventures, build and take control of a kingdom or even play with each hero in this Sim the territory. A combination of classic Sims gameplay combined with touches of strategy and role-playing mechanics. 

System requirements for Windows XP: 
-------------------------------------------------- ----------- 
- Pentium IV 2 GHz or equivalent 
- 1 GB of RAM 
- 256 MB video card with Pixel Shader 2.0 
- The latest version of DirectX 9.0c 
- Microsoft Windows XP Service Pack 2 
- 5.3 GB of free hard disk space and at least 1 GB of free space to store 

System requirements for Windows Vista: 
-------------------------------------------------- - 
- Pentium IV 2.4 GHz or equivalent 
- 1.5 GB of RAM 
- 256 MB video card with Pixel Shader 2.0 
- Microsoft Windows Vista Service Pack 1 
- 5.3 GB of free hard disk space and at least 1 GB of free space to store 

Windows 7 System Requirements: 
-------------------------------------------------- - 
- Pentium IV 2.4 GHz or equivalent 
- 1.5 GB of RAM 
- 256 MB video card with Pixel Shader 2.0 
- 4.5 GB of free hard disk space and at least 1 GB of free space to store

Installation instructions: 
-------------------------------------------------- 
1) Image with Daemon Tools

3) Copy contents of crack folder in the folder where you installed the game (replace) 
4) Play!
